task.question: Near what town of Judah did the Danite soldiers camp that was named “Mahaneh Dan (Judg 18:12)?
What was the camp area called that was west of Kiriath Jearim where the Danite soldiers camped on their way to Laish (Judg 18:12)?
In what tribal area was the house of Micah (Judg 18:13)?
Why did the Danites go to Micah’s house (Judg 18:14)?

choices.choice: He invited them to spend the night there
For Micah’s ephods and household gods
Micah was formerly from the tribe of Dan

task.answer: For Micah’s ephods and household gods

task.question: Who told the Danite warriors about the idols in Micah’s house (Judg 18:14)?

choices.choice: Micah’s Levite that he had made his priest
The man of God out of Judah
A woman at the well of Shechem
The five Danites who had spied out Laish

task.answer: The five Danites who had spied out Laish

task.question: Who did the Danites greet at Micah’s house (Judg 18:15)?
The Danites took all of the following EXCEPT ______ from Micah’s house (Judg18:17).
Who took the idols from Micah’s house (Judg 18:17)?

choices.choice: The young Levite who had become Micah’s priest
The five Danites who had spied out the land

task.answer: The five Danites who had spied out the land

task.question: In the narrative who objected to the Danites taking Micah’s household gods (Judg 18:17)?

choices.choice: The Levite whom Micah had made a priest
The Danites who had spied out the land

task.answer: The Levite whom Micah had made a priest

task.question: According to the Danite spies reasoning with Micah’s Levite priest, what would be better for the Levite (Judg 18:19)?

choices.choice: To serve a tribe rather than one man
To die rather than stay with Micah
To serve the Lord rather than serving idols
To travel to Laish and live in prosperity among them

task.answer: To serve a tribe rather than one man
